title: An Atlas of Impossible Longing motherless

content.question: In the first paragraph, by incorporating the small detail that Bakul is motherless, the narrator

choices.label: suggests Nirmal’s need for assistance in household affairs
emphasizes Bakul’s fixed isolation and detachment
exposes Bakul’s increasing disinterest in Nirmal’s work
explains Nirmal’s fervent dedication to his daughter

content.answer: emphasizes Bakul’s fixed isolation and detachment
